title: Leases Available in Madison Heights,Hazel Park,Royal Oak,Ferndale
posting_body: ['If you are looking for a rental in the Metro Detroit Area, we can help.', ' We are licensed realtors specializing in Madison Heights, Hazel Park, Royal Oak, Ferndale as well as other cities in the metro Detroit area.', ' We have many years of experience finding properties for transferees to lease or purchase.', 'We are happy to preview properties for you based on your criteria and have a house or condo ready for you when you arrive.', '   Lease prices starting at $1,500.', ' Minimum 1 year lease.', '  You do not pay the taxes or association fees.', 'There is no charge to you for my service.', 'Please note that I can show you any property that is listed by a real estate agent so there is no need for you to work with multiple agents.', 'Please answer the questions below and you will be quickly contacted and a list of available properties will be sent to you that meet your needs.', '(Photos are samples of homes I have recently leased)', 'Let me know the following:', 'What city/cities are you interested in?', 'Do you wish to lease or purchase?', 'Do you prefer a house or condo?', 'How long of a lease do you want?', '(1 year minimum)', 'What is your price range?', 'How many bedrooms/bathrooms do you need?', 'Do you need a garage and/or basement?', 'When are you ready to move?', 'Do you have any pets?', ' If so, the breed and weight.', 'What is your credit score?', ' Minimum 650 please.', 'If you would like to speak on the phone, what is your telephone number?']
